home-title: Hi! My name is Justina. I'm a Full-stack developer
home-subtitle: Thank you so much for taking an interest in my work. Feel free to explore more about my journey and experience in software development.
aboutMe-p1: I've been interested in the world of software development for several years, but it was in 2024 that I began my formal studies at UTN. This training gave me a well-rounded understanding of application development, which has been key to grasping the full process, communicating effectively with other technical roles, and working collaboratively within a team.
aboutMe-p2: I also have a strong command of English, backed by my professional experience as an English-Spanish software translator, which allows me to navigate technical documentation and international environments with ease.
projectsIntro: Here are some of my main projects. Click on any of them to explore more details.
devTools: Throughout my learning journey, I've gained experience with various programming languages and development tools that have allowed me to continuously improve the quality of my work.
contactText: Have any questions or need more information? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
